room_title: Escape room "The Raven" by Unlocked History Escape Rooms in Charlottesville
room_description:
It’s 1826. Edgar Allan Poe has begun his first year at the University of Virginia. But on one midnight dreary, Edgar goes missing. The only known witness to his whereabouts is a ghastly, grim, and ancient raven perched above his bedroom door.

Will this mystery you explore? And will you find Edgar’s long lost love Lenore? Quoth the Raven, “NEVERMORE.”
